price: Tí wọ́n bá pè ọ́ ní òpùrọ́, sọ pé: “Tèmi ni iṣẹ́ mi. Tiyín ni iṣẹ́ yín. Ẹ̀yin yọwọ́ yọsẹ̀ nínú ohun tí mò ń ṣe níṣẹ́. Èmi náà sì yọwọ́ yọsẹ̀ nínú ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣe níṣẹ́.”
arabic: وَإِن كَذَّبُوكَ فَقُل لِّي عَمَلِي وَلَكُمۡ عَمَلُكُمۡۖ أَنتُم بَرِيٓـُٔونَ مِمَّآ أَعۡمَلُ وَأَنَا۠ بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kadhabūka faqul lī ʿamalī walakum ʿamalukum antum barīūna mimmā aʿmalu wa-anā barīon mimmā taʿmalūna
